Pearland.Friendswood High School:
Friendswood High School is a public secondary school located in Friendswood, Texas, United States.
Friendswood High School is a 6A educational facility which serves grades 9 through 12, and is a part of the Friendswood Independent School District.
Most of the city of Friendswood is within Friendswood ISD and is zoned to Friendswood High School.
